name: Shoot & Hook
description:
Sidescroll action shooter in which you have to destroy enemies and overcome obstacles. Thanks to a heavy blaster, a grappling-hook and you skills nothing will be able to stop you!

This game has strong references to Megaman trying adding new elements in order to bring something fresh.

Break your personal record, replaying and masterizing the game. Challengning your friends is always fun :)

Estimate duration: 5 - 25 minutes

Shoot & Hook is a personal project in which I tried to make something very little but enjoyable. So if you have a free moment, don't hesitate and give it a try!
